VehicleDefinition.name: VehicleDefinition
VehicleDefinition.description: Represents information about a typical vehicle model.

AccelerationTime.description: The acceleration time of the vehicle model.

AuxiliaryBatteryType.description: The type of auxiliary battery used in the vehicle model.

BatteryCapacity.description: The capacity of the battery fitted in the vehicle model.

BodyType.description: The body type of the vehicle model.

CombinedFuelEconomy.description: The overall fuel consumption, which is the total of urban and extra-urban fuel consumption.

CurbWeight.description: The weight of the vehicle model without any payload, such as fuel, passengers, cargo, and so on.

DoorCount.description: The number of doors in the vehicle model.

DoorStyle.description: The style of doors in a vehicle. Use this field because the field DoorStyleType will be deprecated soon.

DoorStyleType.description: The door style of the vehicle model.

DrivetrainSystem.description: The drivetrain system implemented in the vehicle. Use this field because the field DrivetrainType will be deprecated soon.

DrivetrainType.description: The drivetrain system implemented in the vehicle model.

EmissionStandard.description: The emission standard applicable to the vehicle model.

EngineCubicCapacity.description: The engine capacity of the vehicle model.

EngineName.description: The engine used in the vehicle model.

ExternalReferenceNumber.description: The unique identifier of the vehicle model. This is an external ID.

ExtraUrbanFuelEconomy.description: The fuel consumption in the country roads and motorways driving environment.

FuelSource.description: The power source used in the vehicle. Use this field because the field FuelType will be deprecated soon.

FuelTankCapacity.description: The fuel tank capacity of the vehicle model.

FuelType.description: The power source used in the vehicle model.

GeoCountryId.description: The country associated with the vehicle modelâ€™s specifications.

Height.description: The height of the vehicle model.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Length.description: The length of the vehicle model.

MainBatteryType.description: The type of main battery used in the vehicle model.

MaximumBatteryRange.description: The distance the vehicle model can run with the available battery capacity.

MaximumGrossWeight.description: The weight of the vehicle model with the maximum payload that it can carry.

MaximumTorque.description: The maximum torque of the vehicle model.

MinimumBatteryRange.description: The minimum range of the battery for the vehicle model.

ModelCode.description: The code of the vehicle model.

Name.description: The name of the vehicle model.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProductId.description: The Product record associated with the vehicle model.

TopSpeed.description: The highest speed that the vehicle model can achieve.

TotalPower.description: The maximum power that the vehicle model can deliver.

TransmissionSystem.description: The transmission system implemented in the vehicle. Use this field because the field TransmissionType will be deprecated soon.

TransmissionType.description: The transmission type of the vehicle model.

UrbanFuelEconomy.description: The fuel consumption in the city driving environment.

VariantName.description: The variant name associated with the vehicle model.

VehicleClass.description: The classification of the vehicle model.

Wheelbase.description: The wheelbase of the vehicle model.

Width.description: The width of the vehicle model.
